channel.title: Someone Keeps Crashing my Server What Should I Do?
channel.description: Okay a person is using a program that creates a lot of connections on my server i ipban that ip adress also added to ban host but the person can still connect

item.title: Someone Keeps Crashing my Server What Should I Do?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“Mod Franklin, post:6, topic:282121”]i think hes using
Syipkpker
i was wondering if anyone can help me edit my source so it only alow one connection per ip[/quote]Nah but I know an anti syipkpker and its work 100% it stops syipkpkers from crashing, Here the link for it
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=243&start=0&p=16696&hl=real%20way%20to&fromsearch=1&#entry16696

Read full topic
